announcements.title: Launcher v2.1.0 Released
body: This is update brings a few new additions, changes and fixes:
- Added a new “Move to position” option when right-clicking a Library game
- Improved DPI scaling to reduce cut-off UI on Store, Library, Details, and Settings
- Added a “Website” button in Settings to open the Nexus Launcher website
- Fixed an issue where the launcher briefly switched from Store to Library on startup when Library is set as the start page

announcements.title: Everdew v0.3.4 Released
body: Everdew has been updated to version 0.3.4!
This update includes small additions and fixes:
- Added a fullscreen toggle in the pause menu
- Added a resolution dropdown in the pause menu
- Made the transition from main menu to game smoother
